subject: Baseball
World Series
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Red Sox closer Jonathan Papelbon’s Irish jig has garnered as much notice as his fastball, which helped him save 37 games with a 1.85 earned run average this season.
snippet: Red Sox closer Jonathan Papelbon’s Irish jig has garnered as much notice as his fastball, which helped him save 37 games with a 1.85 earned run average this season.
